document.full_text: lindsey vonn of the united states had the best giant slalom result of her career, finishing third behind germany?s viktoria rebensburg in a world cup race in spindleruv mlyn, czech republic.
document.title: vonn third in giant slalom
lines_and_colors: lindsey vonn of the united states had the best giant slalom result of her career, finishing third behind germany?s viktoria rebensburg in a world cup race in spindleruv mlyn, czech republic.
